title: [Large-Scale] Science Project-Based Learning for Improving Bilingual Switching and Inhibitory Control Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate comprehension of scientific terminology and basic foreign language (English/Korean) communication skills
context.additional_context: Real-time language-switching task performance and scientific problem-solving project implementation using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners reduce response time during language switching between L1 (base language) and Lnew (new language) by 20% within six months.
Learners decrease target language selection error rates by 30% during project presentations.
Learners improve cross-linguistic interference suppression ability by 15% through ERP-based task performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
